body.p: Most respondents agreed with the Board’s proposal and consequently, the Board decided to retain the proposal from its 2010 Hedge Accounting Exposure Draft. However, as a consequence of the Board’s decision to also allow an alternative accounting treatment for forward elements and foreign currency basis spreads, the Board also required that for the purpose of the IAS 1, amounts recognised in accumulated other comprehensive income that relate to forward elements and foreign currency basis spreads should be reconciled separately from amounts in relation to time value of options.
